title: Pixel 2 crashes on incoming calls when battery is 50% or less
content: I have observed that when my pixel 2 is 50% or low in battery, it usually crashes suddenly especially when there is a incoming call. This issue become more frequent when battery is less than 25%. After crash on restart no call log gets captured. Seen crash happening on incoming messages and while using any app including Google apps. I have latest Android installed.
